title: Font ID from book cover: Mr Wonderful takes a Cruise
content:
Hello,

I would like to know what the font for the title of this book is?

Thanks!

Font: 

 Compass TRF 

Solved By: 

 [osamu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422055033/http:/typophile.com/user/215937 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [{764E366B-4105-4D34-B676-4F5C9BDEE8A0}Img100.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422055033/http:/typophile.com/files/%7B764E366B-4105-4D34-B676-4F5C9BDEE8A0%7DImg100.jpg) | 382.78 KB |
author: aharvey

comments.content:
[Compass](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422055033/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografiaramis/compass-trf/) and Compass Italic from TRF.

The /W doesn't appear as an accessible alternate so it could be the earlier 2002 version of the font (which seems to be no longer available) that was used, or it could be custom.
